title: Connection
body: Hey this past week ive been getting constant bad connection to league, even on the client. Its been saying attempting to reconnect etc. I check discord and it says i have 27 ping and im still connected and can be heard clearly. I was just wondering whether it was my net or just the game being laggy. Pls help its making me want to play league less. :)

replies.body: probs something to do with your firewall

I've got a similar problem as well, but its only when I'm in game.
I'll end up getting random lag spikes up to about 400-450 in which drop down after a few seconds, and it repeats this every 10 or so seconds for the entire match.
But the moment of the spike its almost like my character freezes and 9/10 times i end up dead because of it.
